content: **Celestial Nonary Pills** are items you can find in Black Myth: Wukong that permanently increase your maximum Stamina. Stamina is a core skill in Black Myth: Wukong that affects how far you can sprint and even how many combos you can produce. If you want as much Stamina as possible, here is where you can find each and every Celestial Nonary Pill.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Celestial_Nonary_Pill_Locations.md', within the main section titled 'Celestial Nonary Pill Locations'.
The content is as follows:
**Celestial Nonary Pills** are items you can find in Black Myth: Wukong that permanently increase your maximum Stamina. Stamina is a core skill in Black Myth: Wukong that affects how far you can sprint and even how many combos you can produce. If you want as much Stamina as possible, here is where you can find each and every Celestial Nonary Pill.
